first_para: Harriett Mary Morison Baldwin (born 2 May 1960) is a British Conservative Party politician. She has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for West Worcestershire since the 2010 general election.

full.extract: Harriett Mary Morison Baldwin (born 2 May 1960) is a British Conservative Party politician. She has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for West Worcestershire since the 2010 general election.
full.title: Harriett Baldwin
